wikitext.*:
<noinclude>仅用于站内找不到页面时的提示信息（[[MediaWiki:Noarticletext-nopermission/zh-hans]]、[[MediaWiki:Noarticletext/zh-hans]]）</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wg404search) || !$wg404search}--><!--{assign var="wg404search" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function(){
    mw.loader.implement("widget404search",function($, jQuery){
        $('#404search form div').children().appendTo($('#404search form div').empty());
        $('#404search input[type="text"]').outerHeight($('#404search input[type="submit"]').outerHeight(true));
    });
});</script><style>
.bodySearch * {
    transition: all .37s linear;
}
</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
